system_message: You are an interview prep specialist. Create a detailed guide for {company_name} - {position}. Output MUST be valid JSON only.
human_template:
Create an INTERVIEW RECONSTRUCTION GUIDE for {company_name} - {position}.
Data:
{scraped_data}

Schema:
{
  "company_overview": {"name": "", "industry": "", "size": "", "headquarters": "", "mission": "", "culture": "", "recent_news": []},
  "interview_questions": [{"question": "", "category": "behavioral|technical|situational|culture_fit|role_specific|problem_solving|system_design|coding|leadership", "difficulty": "easy|medium|hard", "tips": "", "sample_answer": "", "key_points_to_cover": [], "follow_up_questions": [], "red_flags": [], "company_specific_context": ""}],
  "coding_problems": [{"title": "", "difficulty": "easy|medium|hard", "problem_statement": "", "example_input": "", "example_output": "", "constraints": [], "leetcode_number": 0, "leetcode_url": "", "topics": [], "approach_hints": [], "optimal_time_complexity": "", "optimal_space_complexity": "", "frequency": "very_common|common|occasional|rare", "company_specific_notes": ""}],
  "system_design_questions": [{"question": "", "scope": "", "key_components": [], "evaluation_criteria": [], "common_approaches": [], "follow_up_topics": [], "time_allocation": ""}],
  "mock_scenarios": [{"scenario_title": "", "stage": "", "duration": "", "opening": "", "questions_sequence": [], "expected_flow": "", "closing": "", "time_for_candidate_questions": true, "good_questions_to_ask": []}],
  "interview_process": {"stages": [{"stage_name": "", "description": "", "duration": "", "format": "", "interviewers": "", "focus_areas": [], "sample_questions": [], "success_criteria": [], "preparation_strategy": ""}], "total_duration": "", "preparation_tips": []},
  "technical_requirements": {"programming_languages": [], "frameworks_tools": [], "concepts": [], "experience_level": "", "must_have_skills": [], "nice_to_have_skills": [], "domain_knowledge": []},
  "what_they_look_for": [],

}
